about_the_game:
Escape the Escape Rooms

Do you have what it takes to survive?

Do you have what it takes to escape and dash for freedom?

Can you work with a team to escape?

Play with a team or if you don't trust the other squad members make sure you escape before them. Join our mindboggling game with other players and attempt to make that mad dash to freedom.

Be warned things are not as they may seem and you are not alone in there. Don't waste time and make sure you get to freedom.

If your a bit of a trickster you can tease your team mates but locking them in a seperate room while you run for it but you have to run and don't look back.

WE SAID DON'T LOOK BACK.....

content_descriptors.notes: Horror scenes that some users may find frightening.

If your a bit of a trickster you can tease your team mates but locking them in a seperate room while you run for it but you have to run and don't look back.

name: Escape The Escape Rooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • VR Support: TBC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or HIGHER
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050ti or GREATER
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • VR Support: TBC

short_description: A mind twisting and puzzle filled horror escape simulator. Plan your escape to freedom by finding keys, completing puzzles and either work as a team or go for freedom on your own. But be warned you are not alone in there.
